# cancelPendingPrerolls()

**Instance Method**

Cancels any pending preroll requests and invokes the corresponding completion handlers, if present.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated func cancelPendingPrerolls()
```

## Discussion

This method cancels and releases the completion handlers for any pending prerolls. The finished parameter of the completion handlers passed to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayer/preroll(atRate:completionHandler:)] will be set to `false`.

## Synchronizing multiple players

- **setRate(_:time:atHostTime:)**: Synchronizes the playback rate and time of the current item with an external source.
- **preroll(atRate:completionHandler:)**: Begins loading media data to prime the media pipelines for playback.
- **sourceClock**: A clock the player uses for item time bases.
- **masterClock**: The host clock for item time bases.
